member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect
member.summary: Converts an image from unpremultiplied to premultiplied alpha format.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Premultiply effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PremultiplyEffect class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the PremultiplyEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Premultiply effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of this CanvasImage, in device-independent units.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.GetBounds(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.CanvasDrawingSession,System.Numerics.Matrix3x2)
member.summary: Retrieves the bounds of the CanvasImage, in device-independent units.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PremultiplyEffect.Name
member.summary: Attaches a user-defined name string to the effect.
